name: Proof 360 — Morning Temperature, Clear Sky Before Work
description:
This proof records the morning environmental condition at MaMeeFarm on 20 December 2025 at 07:27 (GMT+7).

The image shows a digital thermometer placed inside the former duck shelter, recording an indoor temperature of 15.6°C, outdoor temperature of 15.1°C, and relative humidity of 88%.

The sky condition in the early morning is clear, indicating stable weather before the start of daily farm activities.
Although the farm currently has no ducks, environmental monitoring continues as part of the DGCP continuous proof system.

This record reflects consistency in daily observation practices, independent of livestock presence, and preserves real-world environmental data without alteration.
